item.description:
I boycotted Za for a year after it opened, stupidly thinking it was just a pretentious pizza joint. Well they do serve pizza, but it's not a joint, and the food is unlike anything you've ever experienced. And it's good! Fare is simple: they have pizza, they have little mounds they call salads (which I particularly love) and they have beer/wine.

Their web site is: www.zarestaurant.com
Pizzas are perhaps $15 and Salads perhaps $8.

Parking is easy in Arlington.
item.why: This is pizza like you've never experienced. And it's good!
item.name: Za
